Quest_Name: The Gods of the Aegean Sea
General_Description: '''The Gods of the Aegean Sea''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: The fleets that mysteriously disappeared in the night did not meet [[Siren (mythology)|sirens]], nor [[Charybdis]], nor the [[Lernaean Hydra|Hydra]], but the [[Gods of the Aegean Sea|Gods of the Aegean]]. [[Cult of Kosmos|The Cult's]] masters of the sea, they left chaos in their wake.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every member of the Gods of the Aegean Sea, gaining the [[Pirate Set]], [[Gorgoneion Xiphos]], as well as a clue to the [[Aspasia|identity]] of the [[Ghost of Kosmos]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
